text:
- [Narrator] Consumers
today are interacting

with brands through
many digital touchpoints

like social media, ads,
email, websites and more.

These customers expect
real-time relevant experiences
across these digital channels

as they consider, purchase,
and use products and services.
However, many organizations

across industries like retail
and media and entertainment,

struggle to deliver
customization due to complexities

and costs of implementing
a personalization solution,

the limitations of static
rule-based systems and friction
with platform integration.

Machine learning can
overcome these challenges,
to provide a truly personalized experience
for your customers.
And AWS Artificial Intelligence,
AI, and Machine Learning, ML,

can make implementing a machine
learning solution easier
and more cost-effective.

To increase customer
engagement and conversion,
AWS offers two approaches that can be used

to implement an ML-based
personalization solution.
If you're looking to get started today
with no ML expertise required,

AWS offers Amazon Personalize,
a service that leverages

over 20 years of personalization
experience at Amazon.

With this service, you can
easily build applications

that deliver specific
product recommendations,
individualized search results,
(gentle music)
or customize marketing communications.
Amazon Personalize uses ML algorithms
rather than rigid predefined rules.
This means the service can quickly adapt

to real-time changes in consumer
behavior and preferences;

increasing engagement,
conversion, and revenue.

You can easily integrate
Amazon Personalize
into your existing websites, apps, SMS

and email marketing systems
to deliver unique experiences

for your customers across
channels and devices.

Alternatively, organizations
that want to develop their own

machine learning models
for personalization
can use Amazon SageMaker,

a fully-managed service
that helps data scientists
and ML developers build,

train and deploy machine
learning models quickly.

SageMaker provides all of
the tools required for ML

in a single service, and
removes the heavy lifting

from each step to make it
easier to develop high quality

machine learning models
for personalization.

Provide more personalized
digital experiences
for your customers.
with machine learning solutions from AWS.
Learn more and get started today.
